content.title: Nirmaan Sthal Par Karya Ke Dauran A-panjeekrat Shramik Ke Mratyu Ki Dasha Me Antyeshti Evan Anugrah Rashi Bhugatan Yojana
content.details: The scheme falls under the purview of the Labour Department of Madhya Pradesh. The scheme provides financial assistance in the form of funeral and ex-gratia payments to the legal heirs of unregistered construction workers who die during construction site work under the MP Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board. The deceased worker does not need to be registered with the Madhya Pradesh Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board.
eligibility: The applicant should be a domicile in the state of Madhya Pradesh.
Applicant should be a Building and other construction worker.
Applicant age should be between 18 to 60 years.
content.application_process: Offline. The applicant has to submit the application form in the prescribed format and within the time limit to the office of the designated officer. Rural area - Chief Executive Officer, District Panchayat; Urban area - Commissioner, Municipal Corporation / Chief Municipal Officer, Municipality / Municipal Council. Apply duration: Within 06 months from the death of the construction worker.
documents_required: Copy of post-mortem report and FIR copy.
Disability certificate given by the District Board in case of permanent disability.

faqs.question: What is Beneficiary Requirements?
faqs.answer: There is a provision to provide the benefits of the scheme to the heirs of an unregistered construction worker in case of his death at his workplace.

faqs.question: What benefits are provided under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Financial assistances are provided under the scheme.

faqs.question: How much financial benefits are provided in case of accidental death?
faqs.answer: Financial benefits are provided under categories 1. Funeral assistance of ₹ 3,000/- and 2. Accidental death benefit ₹ 4,00,000/-.

faqs.question: How much financial benefits are provided in case of permanent disability?
faqs.answer: In the case of permanent disability, ₹ 2,00,000/- amount will be provided.

faqs.question: Who can get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: All eligible construction workers from the Madhya Pradesh State.

faqs.question: How to get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: Applicant needs to visit the below offices to get the benefit. 1. Rural Area - Chief Executive Officer, Janpad Panchayat 2. Urban Area - Commissioner, Municipal Corporation/Chief Municipal Officer, Municipality/Municipal Council.

faqs.question: What Documents are required?
faqs.answer: 1. Prescribed application form. 2. Death certificate. 3. Copy of post-mortem report and FIR copy. 4. Disability certificate given by the District Board in case of permanent disability.

faqs.question: What will the time duration to get the scheme benefits?
faqs.answer: Beneficiaries need to submit the application within 06 months from the death of the construction worker.
